image.name: inputMRVolumes
image.label: Input structural MR volumes to create the maximum edgemap

image.name: inputMask
image.description: Input mask file name. If set, image histogram percentiles will be calculated within the mask

double.name: lowerPercentileMatching
double.label: Lower percentile
double.description: Map lower quantile and below to minOutputRange. It should be a value between zero and one.

double.name: upperPercentileMatching
double.label: Upper percentile
double.description: Map upper quantile and above to maxOutputRange. It should be a value between zero and one.

integer.name: minimumOutputRange
integer.label: Minimum Output Range
integer.description: Map lower quantile and below to minimum output range. It should be an epsilon number greater than zero. Default is 1.

integer.name: maximumOutputRange
integer.label: Maximum Output Range
integer.description: Map upper quantile and above to maximum output range. Default is 255 that is the maximum range of unsigned char.

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
